pullrequest.title: Disable tests compilation by default. New 'make tests' target.

content.raw:
Make sense to honor that variable under a cmake/ctest scenario. The page you linked says the it is `ON` by default. If we set it False, will it generate targets for all the individual tests to we could potentially run: `make UNIT_foo`? or it would be necessary to call it explicitly with `BUILD_TESTING:BOOL=True` to generate all the targets?

Thanks for the hint, I did not know that CTest variable.
